fields.name: fileReference
fields.label: Subject Image
fields.description: Aspect Ratios & Recommended Image Dimensions: 'Large' - 12:7 (960x560px), 'Medium' - 12:5 (960x400px), 'Small' - 16:5 (960x300px). The image fills the screen width with a fixed height, causing cropping at top/bottom on larger screens and left/right on smaller screens. Keep key content in the 'central safe zone'. To avoid unexpected cropping, please preview the banner at different screen sizes (desktop, tablet, and mobile) and adjust the image if needed to ensure key content remains visible.

fields.description: Recommendation results will be placed on the page based on content type by order selected, if no content type is selected will be dynamic based on profile context.

fields.name: customHexCode
fields.label: Custom Hexcode
fields.description: Enter the custom hex code, such as FFFFFF (without the # symbol).

fields.name: cta1_Type
fields.label: First CTA Type
fields.description: 'Primary' will render a filled blue CTA, 'Secondary' will render a white CTA with a black border and black text, 'Tertiary' will render a filled black CTA, and 'Custom' will render a CTA with a custom hex color background.

fields.name: cta1_customBgColor
fields.label: First CTA Background Color
fields.description: Select First CTA background color. Select 'Custom Hexcode' to enter the custom color

fields.name: cta1_customBgHexCode
fields.label: First CTA Custom Background Hexcode
fields.description: Enter the custom hex code, such as FFFFFF (without the # symbol). Please ensure to follow the Adobe style guides when selecting CTA Colors

fields.name: cta1_textColor
fields.label: First CTA Text Color
fields.description: Select the text color

fields.name: cta1_linkText
fields.label: First CTA Text
fields.description: Text to be shown inside button.

fields.name: cta1_link
fields.label: First CTA Link
fields.description: What link to open when clicking the button.

fields.name: cta2_Type
fields.label: Second CTA Type
fields.description: 'Primary' will render a filled blue CTA, 'Secondary' will render a white CTA with a black border and black text, 'Tertiary' will render a filled black CTA, and 'Custom' will render a CTA with a custom hex color background.

fields.name: cta2_customBgColor
fields.label: Second CTA Background Color
fields.description: Select Second CTA background color. Select 'Custom Hexcode' to enter the custom color

fields.name: cta2_customBgHexCode

fields.description: Enter the custom hex code, such as FFFFFF (without the # symbol). Please ensure to follow the Adobe style guides when selecting CTA Colors

fields.name: cta2_textColor
fields.label: Second CTA Text Color
fields.description: Select the text color

fields.description: What link to open when clicking the button.

fields.name: text
fields.label: Nav List
fields.description: Should be authored as a nested list. Link attributes should be defined explicitly. For example: https://example.com@newtab will open link in new tab.

fields.name: link

fields.name: start-line
fields.label: Line numbering
fields.description: Add a number to start the numbering the code on a number other than 1.

fields.name: highlight
fields.label: Line highlighting
fields.description: Add number to highlight rows within a code block. E.g. 1-3, 6 will highlight lines 1 through 3 and 6.
